title: EDM Gaming II & IV- Rhythm, Arcade, Racing, Anime, Electronic Game Music Pack
description: Compiled exclusively for Arcade, Racing, Anime and Rhythm games, EDM Gaming II is a Game Music pack that brings life to your games.
longDescription:
From normal aliens who want to save a virtual world, to talking animals who wear the coolest jackets. EDM Gaming II comes back to empower those stories that we all love.


– Listen to this Soundtrack Pack here.


About Soundtrack Pack Artist:


This soundtrack pack contains music from my previous artistic name, Bitonal Landscape. Enjoy!


What’s Inside:


– 5 original high-quality music

– 11 original high-quality music loops

– 16 total files



Tracklist:


01 - Bitonal Landscape - Anthem of Pawa

02 - Bitonal Landscape - Funny Fractal Friday

03 - Bitonal Landscape - Supa Pawa

04 - Bitonal Landscape - Digital Mechanical

05 - Bitonal Landscape - Constelation


– Listen to this Soundtrack Pack here.


What’s Inside:

– 7 original high-quality music

– 15 original high-quality music loops

– 22 total files


Tracklist:

01 - Bitonal Landscape - INKTOBER 

02 - Crystal Clear 

03 - Egipt 7 

04 - District 9 

05 - Multiplanetary 

06 - Bitonal Landscape - Original 

07 - Bitonal Landscape - Hello



(All file formats are in WAV, Stereo, 44.8kHz, 24bit)



With this Music/Soundtrack pack, you also:


– Sound Great in Any Device: All music themes and stingers are fully mixed and mastered so they sound great in any device that your game is played.


– Avoid Incongruent Volumes: All themes and stingers are mastered to reach a fully congruent volume within the full soundtrack.


– Repeat Music Seamlessly: All music themes are fully loop-able, so you can repeat the music in the game seamlessly.



About Composer:


Lufus is a music producer, composer (formerly known as Bitonal Landscape) who has made the Original Soundtrack of multi-million games like:


– Parchisi Star Online (50 Million Downloads)

– Pixel Car Racer (10 Million Downloads)

– Drift Clash (5 Million Downloads)



Support & Help:


If you need help downloading this soundtrack/music pack, feel free to reach out to iamlufus@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Audio file types: WAV

Sample rate: 44.8kHz

Bit depth: 32bit

Loopable: Yes

Additional: Stereo
